<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_92731</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_92731</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La différence entre la réflexion sur un miroir et la  réflexion dispersée</string>
            <string language="en">The difference of mirror reflection and scattered reflection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Unterschied der Spiegelreflexion und der 
zerstreuten Reflexion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A diferença da reflexão do espelho e da 
reflexão dispersada</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La differenza della riflessione dello specchio e 
della riflessione sparsa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διαφορά της αντανάκλασης καθρεφτών και της 
διεσπαρμένης αντανάκλασης</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La diferencia de la reflexión del espejo y de la
reflexión dispersada</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Cette illustration montre qu'un morceau de papier blanc réfléchit la lumière dans toutes les directions tandis qu'un  miroir réfléchit la lumière dans une seule direction.</string>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that a piece of white paper reflects light in all directions while a mirror reflects light in a single direction.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">réflexion sur un miroir</string>
            <string language="en">mirror reflection</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">dispersant</string>
            <string language="en">scattering</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß ein Stück weißes 
Papier Licht in allen Richtungen reflektiert, während ein Spiegel 
Licht in einer einzelnen Richtung reflektiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que uma parte do papel 
branco reflete a luz em todos os sentidos quando um espelho refletir a
luz em um único sentido.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che una parte di carta
bianca riflette la luce in tutti i sensi mentre uno specchio riflette 
la luce in un singolo senso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι ένα κομμάτι της 
Λευκής Βίβλου απεικονίζει το φως σε όλες τις κατευθύνσεις ενώ 
ένας καθρέφτης απεικονίζει το φως σε μια ενιαία κατεύθυνση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que un pedazo de papel 
blanco refleja la luz en todas las direcciones mientras que un espejo 
refleja la luz en una sola dirección.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spiegelreflexion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zerstreuen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reflexão do espelho</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dispersar</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">riflessione dello specchio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">dispersione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντανάκλαση καθρεφτών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">διασπορά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reflexión del espejo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">dispersión</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
